betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Now we can automate a shutoff since we have the temperature sensor.  You will need some red alloy wires which is crafted from red alloy plates and wire cutters.

You can use a screwdriver to changes modes.  If you change to the Greater Than mode, the the temperature sensor will now output a redstone signal whenever it is above the set temperature.
Set the desired temperature by right-clicking the buttons with an empty hand.  The crucible will turn yellow at 2400 K and will melt at 2500 K.

Now place the piston in front and 2 blocks below your burning box, so that when it extends, the block above will be covering the front of the burning box. You can use a block of glass for the block on top of the piston so you can see the burning box is still burning or not.  Since burning boxes need air in front of them to work, when the piston extends it will stop burning.

Now connect the sensor with the piston, using the red alloy wire (you might want to use a wire cutter to make it easier).  It works similar to the pipes where the x in the grid shows which direction the wire is connecting.  

You can connect a lever on the piston to manually trigger the piston to shutoff the burning box.  You can use a piece of paper as a cover to place a lever on the side or top of the wire.  Paper covers do not burn.

Done, you now have an auto shutoff for your crucible with a possible manual shutoff.

There are multiple ways to build these systems.  One would be to have the piston on the side of the burning box and when the piston extends, it will block the burning box front.  You will be usin g these sensors and red alloy wires to do most of your automation including automatic crucibles.
§a
§c§4§c
Careful: a burning box will always finish burning it's current fuel item, that means it's best to use short burning time fuels like nuggets or tiny/small dusts. Make sure to have a buffer for your allowed temperature to accomidate for those extra delays!
§a
To complete this quest craft:
1 Sticky Piston
4 Red Alloy Wires
1 Lever
